Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Shop</color> is now open. Let's take a look.

Name: Celica
Content: Open Inventory.

Name: Celica
Content: Journey log tutorial feature.

Name: Celica
Content: Photo mode tutorial process.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Operation Guide</color> has been unlocked. Let's take a look!

Name: Celica
Content: The Operation Guide is an interface system used to showcase Babylonia content.

Name: Celica
Content: In the <color=#57f0fb>Mission List</color>, you can complete various missions and earn <color=#57f0fb>Star Medals</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: When you collect enough Star Medals, you can claim the corresponding rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, let's talk about <color=#57f0fb>Exploration Progress</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: In Exploration Progress, you can see all the explorable content and challenges available in Babylonia.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete everything under a challenge to earn rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Finish all the challenges, and you'll also get overall completion rewards!

Name: Celica
Content: Lastly, don't forget to check out the <color=#57f0fb>Guide</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: Babylonia is full of fun gameplay features.

Name: Celica
Content: Keep progressing to unlock and complete <color=#57f0fb>Chronicle Missions</color>. They'll introduce you to new gameplay mechanics!

Name: Celica
Content: By completing gameplay activities, you can obtain corresponding rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: And that's a wrap on the <color=#57f0fb>Operation Guide</color> intro! Wishing you a wonderful life in Babylonia.

Name: Celica
Content: In the <color=#57f0fb>Mission List</color>, you can earn <color=#57f0fb>Star Medals</color> by completing missions. Collect enough Star Medals to claim rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete all tasks within a challenge to claim rewards. When you finish all challenge types, you can also claim overall progress rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete <color=#57f0fb>Chronicle Missions</color> to unlock new gameplay activities. Complete these gameplay activities to earn rewards.

Name: Sersha
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Kuroro Coffee</color>, Commandant. You will now be managing Kuroro Coffee's operations.

Name: Sersha
Content: Here you can review your <color=#57f0fb>business objectives</color> and the <color=#57f0fb>rewards</color> they offer. You'll need to complete at least one to finish this management session.

Name: Sersha
Content: Alright, let's jump right into operations!

Name: Sersha
Content: This is the customer <color=#57f0fb>queue</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: This section shows the <color=#57f0fb>business resources</color> each customer provides when seated. Serve them to receive the corresponding resources.

Name: Sersha
Content: This is the <color=#57f0fb>seating area</color>. Just assign customers to these seats to serve them, and they'll be seated in order.

Name: Sersha
Content: Alright, let's get a customer seated!

Name: Sersha
Content: Serving customers will <color=#57f0fb>earn you valuable business resources</color>, and <color=#57f0fb>attract new customers</color> to join your queue!

Name: Sersha
Content: In Business Status, you can view your <color=#57f0fb>sales volume</color> and <color=#57f0fb>business objectives</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: The operations are split into several <color=#57f0fb>time periods</color>. <color=#57f0fb>Customers rotate each period, and any left unserved will leave the queue</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Once you've served your customers, just <color=#57f0fb>check out</color> to move to the next time period. Keep arranging those customers to <color=#57f0fb>boost your sales</color>, Commandant.

Name: Sersha
Content: These customers can generate great sales, but you'll need to <color=#57f0fb>spend Likes</color> to seat them.

Name: Sersha
Content: You can see your current <color=#57f0fb>Likes</color> right here.

Name: Sersha
Content: Commandant, let's start by seating this customer, who can <color=#57f0fb>provide Likes</color>!

Name: Sersha
Content: Next, seat customers who can <color=#57f0fb>consume Likes</color> to increase your overall sales.

Name: Sersha
Content: After seating customers, don't forget to <color=#57f0fb>check out</color>!

Name: Sersha
Content: Look, Commandant! A customer with a special <color=#57f0fb>effect</color> just arrived. Seating them will <color=#57f0fb>increase your seating capacity</color>. Let's get this customer seated first.

Name: Sersha
Content: This customer <color=#57f0fb>gives extra sales when seated at Seat 4</color>. <color=#57f0fb>If you can't meet the condition yet, try seating other customers first</color>!

Name: Sersha
Content: This is the final period, Commandant. Don't forget to <color=#57f0fb>check out</color>!

Name: Sersha
Content: Commandant, you can review past operations and pick up any unclaimed rewards in the <color=#57f0fb>Revenue History</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Now, it's your turn to keep the business running smoothly.

Name: Sersha
Content: Commandant, a customer with multiple effects just walked in! Tap on them to <color=#57f0fb>view their detailed information</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Want to rearrange already-seated customers, Commandant? Use the <color=#57f0fb>Reset Time Period</color> to return them to their initial state.

Name: Sersha
Content: Now it's your turn to put your strategy to work, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Terminal beacon</color> unlocked.\nTap to open the map.

Name: Celica
Content: On the map, you can check your current location and see nearby facilities.

Name: Celica
Content: Approach and unlock <color=#57f0fb>terminal beacons</color> to fast-travel between areas.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the close button to return to the previous screen.

Name: Celica
Content: In the <color=#57f0fb>Photo Wall</color>, you can freely arrange collected photos and decorations.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap on <color=#57f0fb>Collection Album</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Select a photo.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap any empty area to place the photo on the wall.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap [Save] to save the current effect.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Terminal Snapshot</color> has been unlocked. Let's give it a try!

Name: Celica
Content: In <color=#57f0fb>Terminal Snapshot</color>, just drag the screen to move the camera and frame your perfect shot.

Name: Celica
Content: Here, you can adjust the camera's focal length.

Name: Celica
Content: You can also rotate the character to find their best angle.

Name: Celica
Content: Here, you can modify photo-related settings.

Name: Celica
Content: Feel free to tweak the settings based on what works best for you.

Name: Celica
Content: Go ahead and tap the button to take a photo!

Name: Celica
Content: After taking a photo, you can view the current photo and save it to your album.

Name: Celica
Content: Here, you can view previously saved photos.

Name: Celica
Content: That's it for the introduction of <color=#57f0fb>Terminal Snapshot</color>. Please continue the process.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to open <color=#57f0fb>Terminal Snapshot</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Commandant, <color=#57f0fb>Lucia</color> is here to help you with the store management. Let's take a quick look at what she can do for you.

Name: Sersha
Content: Once seated, Lucia will <color=#57f0fb>permanently boost the sales of all seated customers </color> and <color=#57f0fb>never leave the queue whether she's seated or not</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Start by seating Lucia at Seat 1, <color=#57f0fb>and make sure to continue seating her in every time period that follows</color>!

Name: Sersha
Content: These customers receive buffs from Lucia and will produce additional effects. Go ahead and seat them.

Name: Sersha
Content: Commandant, <color=#57f0fb>Karenina</color> is here to help! Let's take a look at what she can do.

Name: Sersha
Content: When seated in <color=#57f0fb>Seat 1</color>, brings in a huge amount of sales. If service gets slow, <color=#57f0fb>converts Likes into substantial sales</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Let's place Karenina in the first seat!

Name: Sersha
Content: Karenina may appear again later. Before that, focus on <color=#57f0fb>accumulating Likes</color>, then <color=#57f0fb>convert those reviews into sales</color> when she returns.

Name: Sersha
Content: Commandant, <color=#57f0fb>Karenina</color> is back. Try placing her in a seat further back to <color=#57f0fb>convert Likes into sales</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Start by seating these customers. <color=#57f0fb>Be sure to assign Karenina to Seat 6 or later</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Commandant, <color=#57f0fb>Bianca</color> is here to help! Let's take a look at what she can do.

Name: Sersha
Content: When Bianca is <color=#57f0fb>not seated</color>, <color=#57f0fb>every seated customer will permanently boost her sales</color>. <color=#57f0fb>Try to seat Bianca during the later time periods</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: When Bianca is <color=#57f0fb>seated</color>, she can <color=#57f0fb>attract specific customers</color>. <color=#57f0fb>Wait until you have recruited at least two of Concordia, Palma, and Issarius before seating her</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Serve more customers to make Concordia, Palma, and Issarius appear faster</color>. Be sure to seat them when they show up!

Name: Sersha
Content: You've been doing a great job managing everything, Commandant! If you'd like to take on more challenges with Kuroro Coffee, give <color=#57f0fb>Signature Mix</color> a try!

Name: Sersha
Content: Let's enter <color=#57f0fb>Signature Mix - 1</color>!

Name: Sersha
Content: Signature Mix stages include <color=#57f0fb>evaluation criteria</color>. <color=#57f0fb>Completing evaluations will help you achieve your business objectives</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>freely view and arrange your customers</color>. <color=#57f0fb>They'll appear from your roster during business operations</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: This section shows the <color=#57f0fb>required number of each customer type in your list</color>. You must meet all quantity requirements before you can begin operations.

Name: Sersha
Content: Once you're happy with your setup, it's time to start the challenge!

Name: Sersha
Content: When Signature Mix begins, you will <color=#57f0fb>randomly receive</color> a set of customers from the roster, plus one chance to <color=#57f0fb>adjust the customers</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: Pick customers you don't need right now and swap them out for random new ones.

Name: Sersha
Content: Once you're happy with your adjustment, tap here to start operating!

Name: Sersha
Content: Here you can see your <color=#57f0fb>current queue</color> of customers. <color=#57f0fb>Customers from the list will appear randomly in rotation.</color>.

Name: Sersha
Content: To pass the assessment, <color=#57f0fb>keep a close eye on the Critics' special effects</color>. Your moment has come, Commandant. Do your best to reach the goal!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Hello, Commissioner! I'm Maru Bear, the Commercial District's special advisor. Let's get started on the Commercial Square's development plan!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Just handle business for <color=#57f0fb>a few rounds</color>, and you'll complete the development plan, bear!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Besides the core objectives, there are also additional <color=#57f0fb>development objectives</color>. If you achieve them, <color=#57f0fb>extra rewards</color> will be waiting for you!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Set your goals and start building the Commercial Square!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: The Commercial Square is still empty, so let's start by building the first store!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Retail</color> stores can generate <color=#57f0fb>income</color> for the Commercial Square, so make sure to build one first!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: To build new stores, you'll need to use <color=#57f0fb>Public Funds</color>. The good news is the council has given us a great startup fund to begin with, so let's get building!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: The store is built! Now, as the Commissioner, you can offer guidance to retail stores on their <color=#57f0fb>business strategies</color>, bear!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: But before we jump into strategies, you need to understand what your customers enjoy. So let's open up store and start welcoming them in!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Whenever you're ready, tap here to start operations!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: During operations, you can adjust the <color=#57f0fb>time flow speed</color> anytime to play at your own pace.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: If things get too busy, feel free to <color=#57f0fb>pause</color> and enjoy a quick cappuccino break.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: A customer left a <color=#57f0fb>tip</color>! They must've loved the service. Be sure to collect it promptly, Commissioner! Tips disappear if you wait too long.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: You've received customer <color=#57f0fb>feedback</color>! Tap here to see what they're saying.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Feedback received! After operations end, you can use their comments to refine your strategy.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: We made a great profit that round! Ready to build the next store?

Name: Maru Bear
Content: This time, we'll be building some fantastic <color=#57f0fb>traffic stores</color>. These are great for attracting <color=#57f0fb>more customers</color> to the Commercial Square.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Now, use the Public Funds to build one!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Unlike retail stores, traffic stores work automatically—no need for complex management strategies. Simply build them, and they'll start <color=#57f0fb>boosting your customer numbers</color> right away!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Perfect, the store is built! Now, let's take a look at the customer feedback we've gathered.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: You'll find all the collected <color=#57f0fb>feedback</color> displayed neatly right here for you to review.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Use your customers' suggestions to try <color=#57f0fb>adjusting your business strategies</color> and make even better decisions!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Once you're happy with all your changes, don't forget to hit <color=#57f0fb>save</color> to lock them in!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: We've earned a solid income! Ready to build our next store?

Name: Maru Bear
Content: This time, we're going to build a <color=#57f0fb>new type of traffic</color> store.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: The Genius Board Game Shop can <color=#57f0fb>increase traffic proportionally</color> for the entire square. How about a fun round of Marumaru cards?

Name: Maru Bear
Content: A quick tip: its effect is more noticeable when traffic is already high. For the best results, I recommend building this after you've already constructed the CUB Experience Store.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: That's all the tips for now! Next, Commissioner, you'll take on the remaining 12 rounds of operations.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: If you manage to <color=#57f0fb>complete all development objectives</color> ahead of schedule, you can <color=#57f0fb>finish the stage early</color> and get off work sooner!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: If you have any questions later, Commissioner, just tap here anytime to check out the Image Guide!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Commissioner, welcome to a brand-new round of development! As always, let's begin by building some stores!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: We've added quite a few new stores for you to build this time!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Ready to try out some new retail stores?

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Unlike Fancy Food, Dolly's Bakery focuses on <color=#57f0fb>adjusting cake designs</color> to win customers' hearts.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Tap the button to <color=#57f0fb>adjust ingredient order</color> and redesign your cakes!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Dolly's Bakery! It looks like the perfect spot to enjoy sweets. I'm excited!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: All stores have been built! Commissioner, whenever you're ready, feel free to start operations!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Have you noticed, Commissioner? This round's development goal is to refresh the overall <color=#57f0fb>atmosphere</color> of the Commercial Square.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Just like traffic stores, atmosphere-enhancing stores also come in two varieties, bear.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Let's start by building Bud Isle Flowers. It'll <color=#57f0fb>boost base Atmosphere</color>!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: In addition to building stores, you can also <color=#57f0fb>upgrade existing ones</color> to increase Atmosphere.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Upgrades can be pricey, so it's best to wait until you've saved up enough resources.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Let's start building!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: To boost Atmosphere, you'll need to build the related stores!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Because higher <color=#57f0fb>Atmosphere</color> delights your customers, which converts into <color=#57f0fb>Satisfaction</color> during the business phase!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Commissioner, keep an eye out. Customer <color=#57f0fb>Satisfaction</color> will sometimes increase during operations.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Also, increasing the <color=#57f0fb>rating</color> of retail stores will boost customer <color=#57f0fb>Satisfaction</color> too. Let's go for 100%!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Commissioner, a new development objective requires you to <color=#57f0fb>build outer ring stores</color>.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Once built, outer ring stores generate <color=#57f0fb>revenue</color> and provide <color=#57f0fb>special effects</color>—each one is <color=#57f0fb>different</color>!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Unlocking outer ring stores requires <color=#57f0fb>meeting specific satisfaction conditions</color>. Improve your store ratings and Atmosphere to expand outward sooner, Commissioner!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Outer ring stores are located around the edge of the Commercial Square, each run by a different organization.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Let's take a look at Akdilek first!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Commissioner, how about building a few more retail stores next?

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Let's begin by taking a look at Inn Elite Department Store.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Let's start building, bear!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Unlike other retail stores, the Inn Elite Department Store needs you, the Commissioner, to personally choose which products to <color=#57f0fb>stock</color>.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Unlike other retail stores, all products in Inn Elite Department Store have <color=#57f0fb>different prices</color>. Please keep this in mind when adjusting your strategies, Commissioner.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: First, go ahead and stock any three products to see what catches your customers' eyes.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Don't forget to save your strategy before you go!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Hey Commissioner, check it out! New outer ring stores are ready to build, bear!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: You can build outer ring stores anytime you have <color=#57f0fb>enough Satisfaction</color>; no public funds are needed.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Once built, every outer ring store will immediately launch a <color=#57f0fb>grand opening promotion</color>, and you get to pick the promotional plan from those submitted by the store!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Each plan has unique benefits, so choose the one that best fits your overall strategy!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Outer ring stores have a different <color=#57f0fb>upgrade method</color> from inner ring stores. They level up by <color=#57f0fb>serving enough happy customers and making sales</color>.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: To help your stores upgrade, you can officially <color=#57f0fb>recommend</color> one outer ring store to attract <color=#57f0fb>more customers</color>.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: The unique <color=#57f0fb>special effects</color> of your outer ring stores are now <color=#57f0fb>active</color>, making operations easy peasy!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: A <color=#57f0fb>sudden event</color> has popped up at an outer ring store. Come check it out, Commissioner!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: A customer has filed a complaint, but the store has presented its side of the story...

Name: Maru Bear
Content: You get to <color=#57f0fb>choose</color> which side to support to resolve the situation, Commissioner!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: After the outer ring stores are built, the Commercial Square will run <color=#57f0fb>regular promotions</color> <color=#57f0fb>at regular intervals</color>.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: During regular promotions, each outer ring store you've built will suggest some <color=#57f0fb>promotional plans</color>—pick the one that best fits your strategy, Commissioner!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: You can always check the <color=#57f0fb>countdown</color> here to see when the next regular promotion starts. Be sure to keep an eye on it, Commissioner!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Ocean Heart Flagship</color> is ready for construction. Don't forget to take a look when you get a chance!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Good news, Commissioner! The <color=#57f0fb>Cedar Shop</color> is now available to build.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: The Golden Daily brings you the headlines, bear! Read it every day, as <color=#57f0fb>different news stories</color> will apply <color=#57f0fb>unique effects</color> to the Commercial Square.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Commissioner, the Commercial Square now offers subscriptions to the <color=#57f0fb>Golden Daily</color>!

Name: Maru Bear
Content: I've heard it sometimes includes <color=#57f0fb>rumors</color> on customer preferences. Once you finish reading, tap here to continue operations.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Every time you run a promotion at Marquee, you can <color=#57f0fb>choose</color> one of two promotional plans.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Commissioner, this is the Marquee. Here's where you can design marketing campaigns for the Commercial Square.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: Keep in mind that promotions run on the Marquee are <color=#57f0fb>time-limited</color>. Once the timer ends, the next promotion will begin.

Name: Maru Bear
Content: If you can <color=#57f0fb>complete the promotional mission</color> objectives before time runs out, you'll receive special <color=#57f0fb>rewards</color>. The choice is yours, Commissioner. Give it a go!
